scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.3.1.js assets/js/vendor/bigfoot/bigfoot.js assets/js/vendor/svg4everybody/svg4everybody.js assets/js/vendor/lity/lity.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.smooth-scroll.min.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.ba-throttle-debounce.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
scripts.start:svg: npm run rimraf && npm run buildsprite
